# harness_platform_gitops_project (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform

  agent_id   = "agent_id"
  query_name = "query_name"
```

- `account_id` (String)

### Optional

- `org_id` (String)
- `project_id` (String)
- `upsert` (Boolean) Indicates if the GitOps repository should be updated if existing and inserted if not.
